user.title: Dynamic DNS setup
user.description: Set up a dynamic DNS service to update your IP address with a dynamic DNS provider.

params.title: {provider} setup
params.description: Set up the parameters for {provider}. Refer to your provider's documentation for the required information.

data_description.domain: The domain to update (example.com or home.example.com)
data_description.host: The host or subdomain part to update (for example, home in home.example.com)
data_description.username: Your username for the dynamic DNS service
data_description.password: Your password for the dynamic DNS service
data_description.token: Your token for the dynamic DNS service
data_description.url: The update URL with all required parameters for the custom dynamic DNS service
